rmangal 0.6.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Vignette Title

Search mangal datasets

Source: R/search_datasets.R
search_datasets.Rd

Search mangal datasets

search_datasets(query = NULL, ...)

Arguments

query

character keyword used to search (case sensitive), or list of custom query.
...

arguments from rmangal::get_gen()

Value

object data.frame: Datasets with all networks and the original reference attached.

Examples

# NOT RUN {
all_datasets <- search_datasets()
all_datasets
class(all_datasets)
# }
# Search with keyword
search_datasets(query = "lagoon")
#> Found 2 dataset(s) for query: lagoon
#> $id
#> [1] 22 52
#> 
#> $name
#> [1] "zetina_2003" "yanez_1978" 
#>

#> [2] "Food web of the Guerrero lagoon"

# Search with custom query (specific column)
search_datasets(query = list(name = "kemp_1977"))
#> Found 1 dataset(s) for query: kemp_1977
#> $id
#> [1] 16
#> 
#> $name
#> [1] "kemp_1977"
#> 
#> $date
#> [1] "1977-01-01T05:00:00.000Z"

#>
